name: rf-class-train-standalone
label: Random Forest Classification Train (Standalone)
description: Component is responsible for running random forest classification training on synthetic data which is created by using scikit's make_classification method. Data creation is inclusive inside the component itself.

arguments.label: Number of Trees
arguments.description: Number of trees in the forest

arguments.label: Maximum Depth
arguments.description: Maximum depth of each tree in the forest

arguments.label: Model output file
arguments.description: File to use for saving the trained model

arguments.label: Shared path
arguments.description: Temporary shared path for model transfer, paths with prefix file:// or hdfs://
